name: Sporadic (Alucard)
description:
This game was created in a week for the 2023 GGJ

Sporadic

Play as a mushroom with possessive abilities trying to escape a laboratory in this Puzzle/Platforming adventure!

The Team Artists

Rene Meegdes - Character Design / Rigging / Animation
Aleksandra Chapevova - Character Design / Rigging / Animation
Mika Goddrie - Character Design / Rigging / Animation
Viktoria Čižíkov - Environment / Props
Leroy Vis - VFX / Props

Programmers

Abdulla Donmez - Gameplay / UI/UX
Ralph Warrand - Gameplay / AI
Stefan Claasse - Gameplay / Tools
Wessel Frijters - Gameplay / Tools

Designers

Sonny Roovers - Gameplay / Level / SFX
Mihail Kostov - Level
Ties de Groot - Gameplay
Tudor Boneanu - Gameplay
Luca Yavuzok - Level / Tech / SFX
